synopsis.text: Karate clubs, bullies, and a mysterious dojo - welcome to the world of Kenichi Shirahama, a high school student who's earned the nickname 'Weak Legs' for his tendency to be a punching bag. Kenichi dreams of becoming stronger, but his attempts to join his school's karate club only lead to more bullying. Enter Miu Furinji, a beautiful new classmate with a hidden talent for martial arts. After witnessing Miu's impressive fighting skills, Kenichi is introduced to the Ryouzanpaku dojo, where he begins a rigorous training regimen under the guidance of several eccentric martial arts masters. As Kenichi's skills improve, he finds himself facing off against the dangerous street gang, Ragnarok. Will Kenichi's newfound strength be enough to protect those he cares about and finally rid him of his 'Weak Legs' reputation? Join Kenichi on his journey to become a world-class fighter in this action-packed anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
